00041 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00042 
00043 /*  The structure for key information */
00044 typedef struct aesCTRCipherContext
00045 {
00046     aesCipherContext    ctx;
00047     union
00048     {
00049         ubyte               counterBlock[AES_BLOCK_SIZE];   /* counter block */
00050         ubyte4              ctr[4];
00051     } u;
00052     ubyte               encBlock[AES_BLOCK_SIZE];       /* encrypted counter block */
00053     ubyte               offset;                         /* offset of unused byte in the encBlock */
00054 } aesCTRCipherContext, AES_CTR_Ctx;
00055 
00056 
00057 
00058 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00059 
00060 /*  Function prototypes  */
00061 /* for AES CTR, the keyMaterial is key + block --- iv is NOT used in DoAESCTR */
00062 /* for RFC3686, construct the block and do not pass the IV as the iv argument */
00063 /* the block is incremented by 1 for each encryption so as to be compatible with RFC 3686
00064 and the EAX mode -- */
00065 
00066 MOC_EXTERN BulkCtx  CreateAESCTRCtx(MOC_SYM(hwAccelDescr hwAccelCtx) const ubyte* keyMaterial, sbyte4 keyLength, sbyte4 encrypt);
00067 
00068 MOC_EXTERN MSTATUS  DeleteAESCTRCtx(MOC_SYM(hwAccelDescr hwAccelCtx) BulkCtx *ctx);
00069 
00070 /* data length does not need to be a mulitple of AES_BLOCK_SIZE */
00071 MOC_EXTERN MSTATUS  DoAESCTR(MOC_SYM(hwAccelDescr hwAccelCtx) BulkCtx ctx, ubyte* data, sbyte4 dataLength, sbyte4 encrypt, ubyte* iv);
00072 
00073 /* this might be easier to use in some cases */
00074 MOC_EXTERN MSTATUS AESCTRInit(MOC_SYM(hwAccelDescr hwAccelCtx) AES_CTR_Ctx* aesCtrCtx, const ubyte* keyMaterial, sbyte4 keyLength, const ubyte initCounter[AES_BLOCK_SIZE]);
00075 
00076 /* data length does not need to be a mulitple of AES_BLOCK_SIZE */
00077 /* limit specifies the last byte to increment -> AES_BLOCK_SIZE -> all bytes will be incremented
00078 0 -> no bytes will be incremented */
00079 MOC_EXTERN MSTATUS  DoAESCTREx(MOC_SYM(hwAccelDescr hwAccelCtx) BulkCtx ctx, ubyte* data, sbyte4 dataLength, sbyte4 encrypt, ubyte* iv, sbyte4 limit);
00080 
00081 
00082 #ifdef __ENABLE_MOCANA_IPSEC_SERVICE__
00083 MOC_EXTERN BulkCtx  CreateAesCtrCtx(MOC_SYM(hwAccelDescr hwAccelCtx) ubyte* keyMaterial,
00084                                 sbyte4 keyLength, sbyte4 encrypt);
00085 MOC_EXTERN MSTATUS  DoAesCtr(MOC_SYM(hwAccelDescr hwAccelCtx) BulkCtx ctx, ubyte* data,
00086                          sbyte4 dataLength, sbyte4 encrypt, ubyte* iv);
00087 #endif
00088 
00089 
00090 #ifdef __cplusplus
00091 }
00092 #endif
00093 
00094 #endif /* __AES_CTR_HEADER__ */
